scripts.init:amodx:binary: cd ./libraries/binary ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @amodx -w ./libraries/binary/dist

scripts.init:amodx:audio: cd ./libraries/audio ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @amodx -w ./libraries/audio/dist
scripts.init:amodx:uri: cd ./libraries/uri ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @amodx -w ./libraries/uri/dist

scripts.init:amodx:network: cd ./libraries/network ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @amodx -w ./libraries/network/dist

scripts.init:amodx:meshing: cd ./libraries/meshing ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @amodx -w ./libraries/meshing/dist
scripts.init:amodx:all: npm run init:amodx:core ; npm run init:amodx:binary ; npm run init:amodx:threads ; npm run init:amodx:uri ; npm run init:amodx:indexdb ; npm run init:amodx:controls ; npm run init:amodx:rng ; npm run init:amodx:audio
